Text: CEO Contact List Cc Jim The attached list contains information on approx of the largest Californiabased companies The list also contains the names of individuals with whom Ken Lay met in May to discuss the energy crisis Most of the companies on the attached list received a mailings from Enron earlier this year The first mailing provided general information about the energy situation in California and the second mailing was about retention of direct access The email addresses for most CEOs or their executive assistants are included on the attached list Please call if you have any questions I may be reached at Sandra Yamane CEOs List June xls CEOs List June xls
